name: VR-Drive City Oil Truck Simulator 3D Free
name_original: VR-Drive City Oil Truck Simulator 3D Free
description:
Let's enjoy an extreme road trip with an adventure of vr drive. Transport oil from station to station by wearing vr glasses to get a real fun of grand oil 3d experience. Let's drive your vr oil truck in a grand city and fulfill your duty as a driver of an oil transporter or a oil cargo drive. It's time to sim your driving experience with vr glasses and enhance your experience as a real driver. So drive vr oil truck on high speed and simulate a real fun of virtual reality with grand oil vr truck in a crazy city with rush of city traffic. Let's start heavy engine and drive 4x4 truck on fast speed and complete your transport mission on time.

Feature:

Grand 4x4 truck with vr simulation. A crazy experience of truck driving in a grand city. Excellent graphics and smooth game play to give you a real effect of virtual reality. Multiple vr oil trucks to unlock. A city with full of traffic. A realistic game play.
